articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends New Year Cards to Party, State Leaders of Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends New Year Cards to Party, State Leaders of Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent New Year cards to party and state leaders of different countries.
					 They included the president of Laos who doubles as general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, presidents of Lebanon, Mongolia, Bangladesh and Sri Lanka, emir of Kuwait, president of Pakistan, president of Palestine who doubles as chairman of the Executive Committee of the Palestine Liberation Organization and chief of the Palestinian National Authority, presidents of Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Armenia, king of Jordan, presidents of Iran and Indonesia and Vietnam, prime minister of Malta, president of Belarus, captains regent of San Marino, presidents of Guinea, Nigeria, Malawi, Mali, Burkina Faso, Algeria, Angola, Uganda, Egypt, Ethiopia, Nicaragua and Mexico.
					
					 Kim Jong Un also sent New Year cards to the co-chairman of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation and the UN secretary general.

articles.title: Officials in Field of Land and Environmental Conservation Meet
articles.content:
Officials in Field of Land and Environmental Conservation Meet
						
 Pyongyang, February 24 (KCNA) -- A meeting of officials in the field of land and environmental conservation was held at the People's Palace of Culture here on Monday.
					 Present there were Choe Yong Rim, Kim Kyok Sik, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol and Thae Jong Su, officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, officials of party and power organs of provinces, cities and counties and those in the field of land and environmental conservation and relevant sectors and officials of the armed forces organs
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un provided a meeting of activists in the movement for general mobilization for land administration last year and made public the work "On Bringing about a Revolutionary Turn in Land Administration as Required by the Building of  a Thriving Socialist Country," laying down important guidelines to be held fast to in this work.
					
					 Service personnel, officials and people across the country achieved many successes in the land administration true to the patriotic intention of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The participants of the meeting watched a video on those successes.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers underscored the need to channel great efforts into planting trees and successfully face-lift the mountains and rivers of the country through a dynamic drive for improving rivers and roads and reinforcing the railroad.

articles.title: DPRK's Kigwancha Sports Team Produces Famous Weightlifters
articles.content:
DPRK's Kigwancha Sports Team Produces Famous Weightlifters
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Kigwancha Sports Team in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is renowned for producing a lot of famous weightlifters.
					 The team, founded in January Juche 45 (1956), began the weightlifting event in 1959.
					
					 Among the world-level weightlifters produced by it is Rim Jong Sim who took the women's 69 kg title of the 30th London Olympiad by lifting 261 kg in total. She was listed as one of the ten best players of the country for Juche 101 (2012).
					
					 Choe Nong Gyun, weightlifting coach of the team, told KCNA:
					
					 "Since its founding, the team has won 18 gold, 33 silver and 87 bronze medals in the weightlifting events of international tournaments, including World Weightlifting Championships, Olympiad, World Junior Weightlifting Championships, Asian Games and Asian Weightlifting Championships.
					
					 Kim Myong Nam of the team won a gold medal in the men's weightlifting 70 kg category of the 28th Asian Weightlifting Championships held in Japan in April 1996. He also bagged gold and bronze medals in the 25th and 26th Olympiads, the 11th Asian Games and the 63rd and 64th World Weightlifting Championships, setting new world records nine times and Asian records twelve times.
					
					 Male weightlifters Kim Jong Nam and Pang Kum Chol, too, obtained excellent results in various international games.
					
					 Female weightlifter Jo Pok Hyang broke the world record in the 63 kg category of the Asian Junior and Juvenile Weightlifting Championships held in Myanmar in 2012.
					
					 Choe Hyo Sim, Ryo Un Hui and Kim Su Jong of the team took the titles of the 58 kg, 69 kg and 75 kg categories respectively in the championships, thus displaying the radically developing weightlifting techniques of the DPRK."

articles.title: High Sulfur Cast Steel Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
High Sulfur Cast Steel Developed in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- High sulfur cast steel has been developed by the Rolling-Stock Research Institute under the Branch Academy of Railway Science in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Stronger than gun metal in anti-friction and wear resistance, the cast steel is an alloy of low carbon steel and much of sulfur.
					
					 It is applied to sliding bearing, angle screws, worm gears, slider, etc, as an alternative to copper alloy.
					
					 With highly-efficient mechanical features, this material is seven times longer than copper alloy in serviceable life.
					
					 It costs one tenth of the copper alloy, giving no adverse effect on environment when casting.
					
					 The introduction of high sulphur cast steel, a new material better than copper alloy, has gone through industrialization for more than 20 years. It was applied to hundreds of varieties of machines in more than 100 industrial establishments, including Sunchon Cement Complex, Tanchon Magnesia Factory and Wonsan Rolling-Stock Complex. The application saved hundreds of tons of copper.
					
					 Its invention was registered as an international patent in September 2012.
					
					 The patentee is O Sung Bong, a section chief of the institute.

articles.title: Poem "For My Only Motherland" Popular among DPRK People
articles.content:
Poem "For My Only Motherland" Popular among DPRK People
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Poem "For My Only Motherland", composed by Hero of the Republic Ri Su Bok, is avidly recited by people, especially youths, in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In the period of the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953) Ri Su Bok silenced a firing enemy pillbox with his body at the age of 18 to open a route of charge for his military unit.
					
					 The poem says in part, "Nothing is more glorious than to dedicate my life to my one and only motherland."
					
					 Kim Ho Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA:
					
					 "Now when the anti-DPRK moves of the United States and other hostile forces have reached a danger line, the poem fans up ardent patriotism among servicepersons.
					
					 To us, Supreme Commander Marshal Kim Jong Un represents our motherland and so there is no more valuable life than to devotedly defend him even at the cost of life.
					
					 All servicepersons are fully ready to risk their lives in an all-out action for defending the nation's sovereignty as Ri Su Bok did."
					
					 Ri Song Ho, a student of Pyongyang University of Architecture who recently volunteered for military service, said:
					
					 "Hero Ri Su Bok's poem is well known to all the Korean youths in the Songun (military-first) era.
					
					 Since the spirit of the hero remains alive in the hearts of millions of local young people, the DPRK will emerge victorious in a showdown with the U.S."
					
					 With the poem kept in their mind, graduates of secondary schools across the country are now volunteering to join the KPA, determined to defend their motherland at the cost of their lives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building Lauded
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats in Party Building Lauded
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's immortal idea of party building and his feats performed in it serve as firm guidelines for the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and treasures of eternal value, says Rodong Sinmun in an editorial on Monday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It was feats performed by Kim Jong Il that he strengthened and developed the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into a revolutionary one in which the system of ideology and leadership of President Kim Il Sung was firmly established, a motherly party which serves the popular masses after forming a harmonious whole with them and an invincible party with steel-strong organization and discipline.
					
					 He formulated the revolutionary idea of Kim Il Sung as Kimilsungism and energetically pushed ahead with the modeling of the whole party and society on Kimilsungism. This exploit goes down in the history of the Party
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership, the Party demonstrated its dignity as a motherly one enjoying the absolute support and trust of the people.
					
					 It is the proud picture of the WPK that all its members work in the monolithic style; they are strong in organization and discipline and share the same breath, say the same words and take the same steps.
					
					 The greatest of his feats is that he provided a sure guarantee for strengthening and developing the Party and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The future of the Party is rosy and the Juche revolution is sure to emerge victorious thanks to such immortal feat he performed by firmly ensuring the succession to the leadership of the Party.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for All-out Action to Cope with "Sanctions"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for All-out Action to Cope with "Sanctions"
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean regime cooked up a "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK,  revealing their intention to persistently deny its ideology and social  system and stifle it, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined article.
					 Accusing the U.S. of using the DPRK's satellite launch as a pretext for stifling it, the article notes: It designated the DPRK as a target of preemptive nuclear attack and is prodding the south Korean warmongers into the moves to provoke a war in a bid to realize its scenario for bringing the DPRK under its domination.
					
					 It is necessary to cope with "sanctions" with an all-out action and a nuclear threat with nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 It is the only way for foiling the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime's ruckus for "sanctions" to bolster up war deterrence for self-defense in every way
					
					 Peace has been preserved on the Korean Peninsula, the most unstable flashpoint in the world. This has been possible only because the DPRK has bolstered up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence to cope with the U.S. and the south Korean regime's evermore desperate moves for aggression.
					
					 Due to the U.S. and the south Korean regime's moves to ignite a nuclear war and their nuclear ruckus against the DPRK, the "joint declaration on denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula" was reduced to a waste paper long ago. 
					
					 As already declared, the army and people of the DPRK will react to a provocation with a prompt counterattack and a war of aggression with a just grand war for national reunification.
					
					 Those who defamed the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK will have to pay a dear price, regretting for what they did too late.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Lee Myung Bak for Kicking Up "Sanctions" Racket against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Lee Myung Bak for Kicking Up "Sanctions" Racket against DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea cried out for "getting fully ready" to cope with the all-out action taken by the DPRK to defend the country's sovereignty while calling it an "additional provocation" and an "open threat". The group of traitors vowed to "impose sanctions stronger than what the UN had done against the DPRK" in case of "additional provocation from it", saying that south Korea would discuss in close touch with the U.S., Japan, etc. the issue related to "additional sanctions."
					 What the Lee group uttered is a traitorous crime to justify and escalate its anti-DPRK "sanctions" racket by branding the DPRK as a "provoker", and realize the group's ambition for "unification of social systems" which it has so far sought, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a bylined commentary.
					
					 The "additional" and "stronger sanctions" touted by the Lee group is a revelation of the bellicose nature of those keen on escalating confrontation with the DPRK, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK considers the Lee group's remarks nothing more than the bluffing of those who were upset by the DPRK's strong will to take toughest stand.
					
					 Confrontation outbursts of the Lee group can neither frighten the DPRK nor put a brake in the way of its advance.
					
					 It is the answer of the DPRK to react to provocation with prompt counterstrike and an aggression war with a just grand war for national reunification.

articles.title: "Sanctions" Will Not Work on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"Sanctions" Will Not Work on DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday censures the UN Security Council's "resolution" which seriously encroached upon the inviolable sovereignty of the DPRK with the backing of the U.S. and those forces that followed it.
					 A bylined article of the paper says that the "resolution" was an unjustifiable step that was aimed to ban the DPRK's peaceful satellite launch, and a product of a criminal attempt to deter the DPRK from developing economy and bolstering its defence capabilities.
					
					 The DPRK has never recognized despicable "resolutions on sanctions" which the hostile forces adopted to infringe on its sovereignty, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 To bring down the DPRK by "sanctions" is a foolish dream.
					
					 The people of the DPRK are heroic people who defeated two imperialisms in one generation. They will never yield to any isolation and stifling moves.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK have been exposed to the enemies' sudden attacks more than once and they have always converted adversity into favorable conditions to emerge victorious.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists which ignited the Korean war in the 1950s sustained a bitter defeat by the brave Korean army and people. The Korean people foiled the enemies' moves with iron faith, pluck and tough counteraction in the 1960s and the 1970s when the U.S. imperialists created a serious situation through war moves and also in the 1990s when the U.S. worked desperately to ignite a new war by kicking up "nuclear inspection" racket against the DPRK.
					
					 "Sanctions" of the hostile forces will never work on the DPRK.
					
					 The "sanctions" are just a revelation of the hostile forces' fear of Korean-style socialism and the might of the DPRK which is making steady victorious progress.
					
					 The unreasonable "sanctions" of the hostile forces will only harden the pledge of the army and people of the DPRK to counter the "sanctions" with a stronger measure for self-defence.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Denounces "Special Pardon" in S. Korea
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Denounces "Special Pardon" in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea recently pushed for a "special pardon" under such spurious signboard as the "great unity of the people".
					 Matter is that through the farce of the "special pardon" he released en masse his close confidants including Choe Si Jung, former chairman of the Broadcasting and News Agency Committee.
					
					 This has touched off unanimous censure and wrath of south Koreans including members of ruling and opposition parties.
					
					 Lee fully disclosed his true colors as not only a special class criminal but as a political swindler who deceived the people and betrayed the nation.
					
					 South Koreans of all social standings regard Lee as a chief culprit of all kinds of social evils and crimes as well as a top class confrontation maniac.
					
					 Those who were granted "special pardon" are philistines and traitors who are directly responsible for the deterioration of the people's livelihood and took the lead in escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 As far as Choe Si Jung is concerned, he, closest confidant of Lee, was put forward as a shock brigade in putting the media under the "government's" control. Lee said that the "post of the chairman of the Broadcasting and News Agency Committee is 100 times more important than that of the director of the Intelligence Service". Choe was thrown into prison being censured by the public as "Goebbels of MB" and "chief of broadcasting and news agency".
					
					 During the period of Lee's office, the south Korean media have become more conservative and reptile, and the ultra-right media took the lead in escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen. Choe played a big role in it.
					
					 These are just typical examples of what were done by Lee through "pardon" for criminals during his office.
					
					 Those who were active for independence, democracy and reunification in south Korea were put behind the bars but they used to be excluded from the list of prisoners subject to "pardon".
					
					 A lot of prisoners of conscience are suffering from pain in prisons and the number of people falling victims to the fascist laws is now on the steady increase.
					
					 All facts prove that the "special pardon" farce is just a means for Lee's stay in power and collection of wealth and that it is not aimed to achieve the "great unity of the people".
					
					 In the closing days of his office, Lee set free a number of criminals who are his close confidants by abusing power. Lee seeks to cover up his despicable crimes and, furthermore, to make dictatorial ruling forces, forces keen on escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen, lord it over in south Korea, and spread their poison throughout its society.
					
					 The recent step of "special pardon" taken by Lee is another crime that adds to the crimes he had already committed.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that the south Korean people are becoming increasingly assertive in criticizing the recent measure as a "group prison breaking" orchestrated by traitor Lee while calling his group an "unveiled Mafia group."
					
					 Lee will have to pay a dear price for all his crimes.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Plan North-targeted Mobile Drill
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Plan North-targeted Mobile Drill
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The 7th Division of the south Korean puppet army announced that it would stage a mobile drill in Hwachon, Kangwon Province of south Korea, from February 4 to 8, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 It was reported that offensive means including tanks and trucks and huge troops would be involved in the drill.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers are busy with war maneuvers for a surprise preemptive strike at the DPRK, availing themselves of the U.S. imperialists' "sanctions" racket against it.

articles.title: U.S. and Its Allies Condemned for Cooking Up "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. and Its Allies Condemned for Cooking Up "Resolution on Sanctions" against DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Chairmen of headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on Feb. 2 denouncing the U.S. and its allies for cooking up the "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK at the UNSC over the DPRK's satellite launch for peaceful purposes.
					 Pak Jong Song, chairman of the Hokkaido Headquarters of Chongryon, said:
					
					 The U.S. hostile act of denying the DPRK's independent right to develop space proves that it was set to make the DPRK's successful satellite launch a new occasion for stifling it. If the brigandish logic of the U.S. to trample down the sovereignty of the DPRK, its life and soul, is connived and jungle law is allowed, the peace in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world will be exposed to a serious danger.
					
					 The shameless double standards and extremely hostile act of the U.S. and its allies seriously wrecking the world peace can never avoid the toughest reaction of the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Hak Bok, chairman of the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, noted:
					
					 The "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK is the height of double standards based on the brigandish judgment that what those countries which are subservient to the U.S. launched is a satellite and what those countries which are hostile to it launched is a "ballistic missile".
					
					 This move proves that the UNSC has been reduced to a marionette speaking for the bandits of brutes led by the U.S., not one for defending world peace, security and sovereignty.
					
					 The war of the army and people of the DPRK for independence and justice will certainly end with victory. The day will come before long when the U.S. and its allies will be made to surrender before the world conscience.
					
					 All the officials and compatriots under the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon will rise up as one in the struggle to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the nation, build a thriving nation and usher in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Korean in U.S. Praises DPRK's Policy of Attaching Importance to Science and Technology
articles.content:
Korean in U.S. Praises DPRK's Policy of Attaching Importance to Science and Technology
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Koreans in the U.S. posted on its internet website on Jan. 16 an article contributed by Kim Hyon Hwan, director of the Institute of Independent Ideology in the U.S., in praise of the DPRK's policy of attaching importance to science and technology.
					 The article said that the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un invited to Pyongyang scientists, technicians, workers and officials who contributed to successfully launching satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 and showed the greatest privilege and deepest loving care to be always remembered by them throughout their lives.
					
					 Satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 launched by the north was produced by its efforts and wisdom and with indigenous technology, ranging from design, manufacture, assembling and observation before and after its launch, the article noted.
					
					 The north is a country of Juche which has never yielded to any blackmail and threat of big powers, it said, adding:
					
					 The successful launch of the satellite, an aggregate of latest science and technology, is the fruition of the Workers' Party of Korea's policy of attaching importance to science and technology and men of talent.
					
					 The scientists and technicians of the north are busy with researches to devote themselves to the country and the nation thanks to strong support of the state.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Introduced by French Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Introduced by French Organization
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The gist of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's New Year Address was introduced by the bulletin of the France-Korea Friendship Association on Jan. 29.
					 The bulletin carried a portrait of smiling leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The bulletin also carried photos of Kim Jong Un visiting the General Satellite Control and Command Centre and making the New Year Address.

articles.title: Seminar on Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Held in Brazil
articles.content:
Seminar on Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Held in Brazil
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A seminar on the dear respected Kim Jong Un's New Year Address was held by the Movement for Genuine Democracy of Brazil on Jan. 22.
					 Displayed in the venue of the seminar were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The seminar was attended by figures of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il, the Movement for Genuine Democracy of Brazil, the Brasilia Federal District Government, the Unique Centre of Workers, a trade union under the Workers' Party and other public organizations and masses.
					
					 The chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il who doubles as national coordinator of the Movement for Genuine Democracy of Brazil said:
					
					 The New Year Address of Kim Jong Un reflects his iron will and great plan to further glorify socialist Korea which was built by Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK will work miracles this year that marks the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 We positively support the Korean people in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and reunifying the country.
					
					 The participants in the seminar hoped only victory and glory would be in store for the army and people of the DPRK in their dynamic advance towards a final victory under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Media
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers and websites devoted special write-ups interwoven with portraits of smiling leader Kim Jong Il and his photos between Jan. 25 and 30 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The Cambodia paper Kmae Amata carried an article entitled "Kim Jong Il revered by people" which said:
					
					 The Korean people celebrate Feb. 16, his birth anniversary, as the greatest national holiday every year. This clearly proves how ardently he is revered by the people.
					
					 He realized the centuries-old desire of the people to live in an independent power.
					
					 That is why the Korean people offer the warmest thanks to him and regard it as the highest honor and greatest happiness for them to hold him in high esteem as their eternal leader.
					
					 The Nepali papers Arpan, the Pakistani paper Baluchistan Times and the website of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship dedicated articles captioned "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be remembered by the people", "Kim Jong Il's patriotism", "Kim Jong Il and snow" and "Footsteps for devotion" to his birth anniversary.
					
					 The articles lauded the revolutionary career and the exploits he performed by dedicating himself to the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness all his life.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Iran
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Iran
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- An Iranian preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Tehran on Jan. 28.
					 The deputy general secretary of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 It decided to have diverse political and cultural events such as remembrance meeting, photo exhibition and film show on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Sweden
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Sweden
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Stockholm, Sweden on Jan. 30.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee set the celebration period from Feb. 11 to 16 and decided to hold diverse political and cultural events including lecture, photo exhibition and film show during the period.

articles.title: British Organizations Praise DPRK's Songun Politics
articles.content:
British Organizations Praise DPRK's Songun Politics 
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Jan. 29 on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution".
					 The joint statement explained the idea and theories on the Songun revolutionary leadership and Songun politics clarified by the work.
					
					 Songun politics fully reflects the requirements of the changing times, it noted, and went on:
					
					 Songun politics which fully embodies the Juche idea serves not only as a treasured sword for defending the DPRK's sovereignty but also as the most powerful weapon for the anti-imperialist struggle.
					
					 His work helps the Songun idea followers across the world understand Songun politics most correctly.
					
					 We call upon the Songun idea followers to deepen the study and dissemination of the work on the occasion of the 10th anniversary of its publication.

articles.title: UNSC's "Resolution" Denounced in India, DR Congo
articles.content:
UNSC's "Resolution" Denounced in India, DR Congo
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Organizations in India and Democratic Congo on Jan. 26 released statements in denunciation of the UNSC's "resolution" against the DPRK. 
					 The All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association said that to launch satellites for peaceful purposes aiming at scientific researches is a legitimate right of sovereign states and the Korean people's exercise of their independent right for people's wellbeing is just. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The "resolution" adopted at the UNSC with the U.S. as a main player is entirely unjust and is a wanton violation of the sovereignty of the DPRK. 
					
					 The struggle of the Korean people to defend the dignity of the country upholding the banner of the Juche idea, Songun idea is sure to triumph. 
					
					 The deceptive UNSC's "resolution" against the DPRK is a blatant challenge to the world peace. 
					
					 We fully support the Korean people in their all-out action to frustrate the anti-DPRK policy of the U.S. and its allies and defend the sovereignty of the country and nation. 
					
					 The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo said:
					
					 We call upon progressive mankind to support the Korean people and struggle against the U.S. reckless policy hostile to the DPRK, branding the UNSC's "resolution" cooked up by the U.S. and its servants as a dangerous thing. 
					
					 We extend solidarity to the Korean people who proudly exercise the independent and legitimate right to launch satellite for peaceful purposes, abiding by the universally accepted international law. 
					
					 We reaffirm that the road of independence and Songun chosen by the Korean people is the only realistic and just way for achieving genuine peace in the world at present.

articles.title: DPRK's Just Stand Supported in DR Congo
articles.content:
DPRK's Just Stand Supported in DR Congo 
						
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Democratic Congo on Jan. 28 made public a statement in support of the statements of the National Defence Commission and the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK. 
					 Those countries that have launched more satellites than any other countries so far assert that the DPRK's satellite launch poses a problem as it was "the launch by use of ballistic missile technology," the statement noted, adding: It is the height of self-deception and double standards.
					
					 We condemn the illegal and unfair "resolution" of the UNSC against the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. should replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty, withdraw its troops under the helmet of the "UN forces" from south Korea and immediately roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK so that the Korean people may achieve national reunification by their concerted efforts. 
					
					 The UNSC should not be implicated in the U.S. hostile acts of violating sovereignty of other countries including the DPRK. 
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people will surely emerge victorious under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Stop Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Stop Moves against DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- Peruvian organizations on Jan. 29 slammed the UNSC for adopting a "resolution" against the DPRK over its legitimate satellite launch. 
					 The Peruvian Committee for Solidarity with Peoples in its written protest said that lurking behind the "resolution" is the U.S. sinister intention to block the DPRK's social progress and development of science and technology, monopolize space and realize its ambition for world domination. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The UNSC's "resolution" cooked up by the U.S. gravely threatens global peace and stability. 
					
					 The U.S. should immediately stop all sorts of anti-DPRK moves, mindful of the bitter defeat it suffered in the 1950-1953 Korean War. 
					
					 We fully support the DPRK's satellite launch, a legitimate right of a sovereign state, and vehemently denounce the UNSC's "resolution". 
					
					 We extend full solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country. 
					
					 The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in its protest letter to the UNSC branded the "resolution on sanctions" fabricated by the U.S. as part of its campaign for aggression and provocation against the DPRK. 
					
					 It demanded the UNSC maintain the fair and universally accepted stand and the U.S. roll back its anti-DPRK policy at once.

articles.title: UNSC's "Resolution" against DPRK under Fire in South Africa, Bangladesh
articles.content:
UNSC's "Resolution" against DPRK under Fire in South Africa, Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- South African and Bangladeshi figures made public statements on Jan. 24 and 28 in which they branded the UNSC's "resolution on sanctions" against the DPRK as a wanton violation of international law. 
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalanga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party who doubles as chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, said in his statement:
					
					 The anti-DPRK "resolution on sanctions" fabricated by the UNSC this time is a wanton violation of international law which publicly recognizes the fact that satellite launch for peaceful purposes is the inviolable independent right of every country. This, at the same time, proved that the UNSC is a marionette of the U.S.
					
					 We send sincere support to the Korean people in their just struggle to defend the DPRK's independent right. 
					
					 We bitterly denounce the UNSC's "resolution" which runs counter to the will of world progressives. 
					
					 M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, said in his statement that the UNSC's "resolution" is a product of its attitude toeing the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK in violation of universally accepted international law. 
					
					 He urged the UNSC to make an apology for gravely infringing upon the sovereignty of an independent state and unconditionally withdraw its unjust "resolutions." 
					
					 He extended full support to the stand of the DPRK that it would continue proudly exercising its independent and legitimate right to satellite launch for peaceful purposes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia tarjetas del Ano Nuevo a los jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia tarjetas del Ano Nuevo a los jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio las tarjetas del Ano Nuevo a los jefes de partido y Estado de varios paises. 
					Entre los destinatarios figuran el secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, los presidentes de la Republica de Libano, Mongolia, la Republica Popular de Bangladesh y la Republica Democratica Socialista de Sri Lanka, el emir del Estado de Kuwait, el presidente de la Republica Islamica de Pakistan, el presidente del Estado Palestino y del Comite Ejecutivo de la Organizacion de Liberacion Palestina y jefe de la Autoridad Nacional de Palestina, los presidentes de la Republica de Tadjikistan, Turkmenistan y la Republica de Armenia, el rey del Reino Hachemita de Jordania, los presidentes de la Republica Islamica de Iran, la Republica de Indonesia y la Republica Socialista de Vietnam, el premier de la Republica de Malta, el presidente de la Republica de Belarus, los regentes de la Republica de San Marino, los presidentes de la Republica de Guinea, la Republica Federal de Nigeria, la Rep
					
					 ublica de Malawi, la Republica de Mali, Burkina-Faso, la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, la Republica de Angola, la Republica de Uganda, la Republica Arabe de Egipto, la Republica Federal Democratica de Etiopia, la Republica de Nicaragua y los Estados Unidos Mexicanos. 
					
					Las tarjetas fueron remitidas tambien al copresidente de la Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il y al secretario general de la ONU.

articles.title: Reunion de funcionarios de rama de proteccion territorial
articles.content:
Reunion de funcionarios de rama de proteccion territorial 
						
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar este lunes en el capitalino Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la reunion de los funcionarios de la rama de proteccion territorial y ambiental.
					Asistieron a la ocasion Choe Yong Rim, Kim Kyok Sik, Kwak Pom Gi, Mun Kyong Dok, Ro Tu Chol, Thae Jong Su y otros funcionarios de las entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales y organismos provinciales, urbanos y distritales del partido y el poder, asi como los de la rama y unidades interesadas y fuerzas armadas. 
					
					El ano pasado el Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio la obra "Para imprimir un nuevo viraje revolucionario a la administracion del territorio nacional conforme a la demanda de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista" a la Conferencia de Activistas en el Movimiento por la Movilizacion General de Administracion Territorial, lo que sirve de guia programatica en ese domino. 
					
					Los oficiales y soldados del EPC, los funcionarios y trabajadores del pais alcanzaron notables exitos en la administracion territorial en pleno acato al proposito patriotico del Mariscal. 
					
					Los participantes vieron una multimedia que recopila los exitos logrados en esa labor.
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos.
					
					Los oradores dieron enfasis a la necesidad de concentrar esfuerzos en la plantacion de arboles, en el arreglo de rios fluviales y carreteras y en el mejoramiento de la intensidad de la ferrovia, de manera que se haga mas hermosa la tierra patria.

articles.title: Jugadores de Conjunto Deportivo Kigwancha
articles.content:
Jugadores de Conjunto Deportivo Kigwancha 
						
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- La pesista Rim Jong Sim es una de los sobresalientes deportistas formados por el Conjunto Deportivo Kigwancha. 
					Al levantar 261kg en total, Rim conquisto la medalla de oro en la categoria de 69kg del levantamiento de pesas en los XXX Juegos Olimpicos realizados en Gran Bretana el 101 (2012) de la Era Juche. 
					
					El Conjunto Deportivo Kigwancha fundado en enero del 45 (1956) de la Era Juche organizo en 1959 la disciplina del levantamiento de pesas. 
					
					Segun el entrenador Choe Nong Gyun (48 anos de edad), desde aquel entonces hasta la fecha el Conjunto contribuyo a obtener 18 medallas de oro, 33 de plata y 87 de cobre en el levantamiento de pesas en varias competencias internacionales incluyendo el Campeonato Mundial, los Juegos Olimpicos, el Campeonato Mundial de Jovenes, los Juegos Asiaticos y el Campeonato Asiatico, de Levantamiento de Pesas.
					
					En el 28o Campeonato Asiatico efectuado en Japon en abril de 1996, Kim Myong Nam conquisto la medalla de oro en el arranque y  la envion de categoria de 70kg.
					
					En los XXV y XXVI Juegos Olimpicos, los XI Juegos Asiaticos y los 63o y 64o campeonatos mundiales de levantamiento de pesas el obtuvo la medalla de oro y la de cobre y batio 9 veces el record mundial y establecio nuevos recordes asiaticos en 12 ocasiones. 
					
					Los pesistas Kim Jong Nam y Pang Kum Chol tambien obtuvieron buenas notas en varias competencias internacionales. 
					
					En el Campeonato Asiatico de Juniores de Levantamiento de Pesas, realizado en 2012 en Myanmar, la pesista Jo Pok Hyang establecio el nuevo record mundial en la categoria de 63kg.
					
					Y Choe Hyo Sim (f) obtuvo el primer lugar en envion de categoria de 58kg y en clasificacion general; Ryo Un Hui (f), en envion y arranque de categoria de 69kg y en clasificacion general; Kim Su Jong (f), el primer y segundo lugar en el arranque y envion de 75kg y el primer lugar en clasificacion general.
					
					Tales exitos demostraron el nivel de esta disciplina deportiva.

articles.title: Desarrollado nuevo material para cojinetes
articles.content:
Desarrollado nuevo material para cojinetes
						
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- El nuevo material para buje de deslizamiento que contiene mucho azufre, desarrollado por el instituto de vagones de la Academia Filial de Ciencias del Ferrocarril, llama atencion interna y externa.
					El acero fundido con alto porcentaje de azufre es el material resistente a la friccion y al desgaste.
					
					Este material, que supera al acero al estano en cuanto a la resistencia a la friccion y al desgaste, fue producido aleando el acero al carbono bajo y el azufre.
					
					El nuevo material se utiliza en sustitucion de la aleacion de cobre de las maquinas utilizadas bajo la siguiente condicion de lubricaciones de aceite: menos de 8.5MPa de maxima presion permisible, 18.23m/s y [PV]=18MPa m/s de la maxima velocidad lineal permisible.
					
					Su indice de caracteristica mecanica es notablemente superior a los materiales de aleacion de cobre y es mas de 7 veces su duracion.
					
					El costo de su produccion es nada mas una decima en comparacion con la aleacion de cobre.
					
					No afecta a la contaminacion del medioambiente durante su produccion.
					
					Durante los 20 anos pasados, el nuevo material se aplico en las instalaciones de centenares de variedades inclusive la trituradora, la prensa y la grua en mas de cien  unidades incluyendo el Complejo de Cemento de Sunchon y la Fabrica de Magnesia de Tanchon y se comprobo suficientemente su eficacia.
					
					Llega a centenares de toneladas la cantidad de cobre ahorrada durante el tiempo de su aplicacion tecnica.
					
					Desde el 99 (2010) de la Era Juche, este material se utiliza ampliamente a escala nacional.
					
					Algunas fabricas y empresas no usan la aleacion de cobre y otros metales no ferrosos en los cojinetes del eje de los equipos de todo tipo.
					
					En septiembre de 2012, la Organizacion Mundial de la Propiedad Intelectual (WIPO) evaluo que la tecnica de produccion de ese material contiene los reglamentos nuevos, reconocio que es muy grande el valor de su generalizacion en el dominio industrial y la registro oficialmente como patente mundial.
					
					Su inventor es O Sung Bong (49 anos de edad), jefe de seccion del mencionado instituto.
